Explanation: The dataset's Title should be at least five words long. Between 7 and 20 words are recommended.
At least one dataset Creator is required.
At least one of Last Name, Organization, or Position Name is required.

Notes: Applies only to parties that require Role.

Explanation: Last Name is required if First Name or Middle Name/Initial is given.
Notes: Applies if first or middle name is provided, but no last name.

Explanation: An Org ID Type is required if an Org ID is provided.
Consider increasing the length of the dataset's Abstract. 20 or more words is a recommended length.
Notes: Currently, shown if number of words < 20.

Explanation: Keywords should be provided to make the dataset more discoverable.
Consider adding more Keywords to make the dataset more discoverable.
An Intellectual Rights policy should be specified.
At least one coverage element should be present in a dataset. I.e., at least one of Geographic Coverage, Temporal Coverage, or Taxonomic Coverage should be specified.

Notes: Applies if geographic coverage is present.

Explanation: Bounding Coordinates are required and must be decimal values.
Notes: Applies if geographic coverage is present.

Explanation: West Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -180.0 and +180.0.
East Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -180.0 and +180.0.
North Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -90.0 and +90.0.
South Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -90.0 and +90.0.
If Bounding Altitude is specified all three fields are required.
An invalid value was encountered for Altitude Units. See the Help for a list of permitted values.
A data table Description is highly recommended.
A data table is required to have one or more Columns.
A dataset should contain at least one Data Table.
A data table has changed since it was uploaded. Please re-upload.
A data table CSV file is missing. Please re-upload.
A Numerical variable is required to have a Standard Unit or Custom Unit defined.
A DateTime variable requires a Format String.
A Categorical variable is required is required to have at least one Code defined.
A Missing Value Code Explanation is required.
A dataset should define at least one Method Step.
A method step is required to have a Description.
At least one Project Personnel is required.
A Data Package ID is required by EML but if you are going to submit your data to EDI you may leave it blank and we will provide one.
The Data Package ID does not conform to EDI's requirements.

ID: Donor Specimen Sequence Number is required.
Donor Section Sequence Number is required.
Donor Section Thickness Units are required.
